title: TikTok's potential ban passes in the Senate. Here's what comes next.
text: The U.S. Senate passed legislation Tuesday night that could lead to a nationwide ban on TikTok, sending it to President Joe Biden for his signature as part of a broader measure to provide support to Ukraine, Israel and other U.S. allies.

title: Tesla Up +7% After Q1 Misses, TXN, Visa Beat on Top & Bottom
text: Noted in Tesla's letter to investors today was the +130% growth in A.I. training.

title: The House Just Passed the TikTok Ban. Here's What That Means for Meta Stock.
text: The House of Representatives moved forward in blocking TikTok but there are still more steps before it could become a reality. Meta generates most of its revenue from ads and videos are a growing source of user engagement.

title: 7 Dividend Stocks to Hold Onto During the Current Market Turbulence

title: 3 Stocks Built to Withstand the Coming AI Tumble
